song.title: Balada pre Dianu (A ballad for Diana)
song.info:
A Ballad for Diana". This track is a sad and romantic piece I composed for my girlfriend, who was about to return from her studies in Paris, where she spent 4 previous months.
The opening theme was a one-shot improvised idea, and after resting for a few weeks I went on and made this track in three nights.
That's about it, let the music tell the rest :)
May 28, 2011
